Aug. 19, 1950 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest 1st Scottish CWS, 2nd Manchester CWS, 3rd Harton Colliery.
Hymn tune 1st Manchester CWS, 2nd Forfar, 3rd Scottish CWS.
Deportment 1st Clydebank, 2nd Scottish CWS, 3rd Manchester CWS. 2nd annual contest.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:06 p.m. June 6, 2014, 9:37 a.m.
1 City of Manchester Eric Ball Themes from Symphony no. 5 [Tchaikovsky, arr. Ball]

3 Clydebank Burgh Band George Hawkins
4 Cooperation Band George Hawkins
